item.description:
Portland is leading the Atlantic Division right now, and this may just be the biggest game left in the season for the PBruins. Also, Feb 18 is Reds Winter Hat night - First 3000 fans in the door get a free RI Reds winter hat. So we'll try to meet early and let folks get to the arena early. We'll likely meet at Murphy's (100 Fountain St) as early as I can get back from Boston, and we'll probably head back to Murphy's after the game.

We need 10+ people to get the group rate. Last year we had near 20. Lets see if we can get a group of 30 this year.

If you want to go, get me $14 by 2/14. The tickets are lower level seats and these seats normally go for $28. I'll be at the Monday meetups for those that want to pay in cash. If you prefer to use pay-pal or amazon payments, I can do that, but it'll be $15 (for the service charges.)

To be clear, if you rsvp for this meetup - I'm not going to hound you for money. If you don't get me (John) the money or make arrangements to pay by 2/12 please don't come ask for a ticket on 2/18, as we won't be buying extras.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing my Virginia Tech scarf - Orange and Maroon stripes.
item.name: Providence Bruins vs Portland Pirates
